title: Data Source Integrations Platform
problem: ProspectPro needs a standardized way to add and manage multiple data providers while tracking per-call costs.
solution: Factory pattern with provider modules (Hunter, Apollo, Google), cost tracking, rate limiting, and circuit breakers. FINRA as premium provider.
acceptance: Rate limiting and circuit breakers in place
FINRA provider subtask with OAuth and endpoints
impact: Faster integrations, lower per-lead costs, enables FINRA premium tier.
requirements: Supabase tables for cost and usage logs
Reusable error handling and retry logic

title: Stripe Usage-Based Billing Implementation
problem: Current pricing is unprofitable versus actual costs.
solution: Stripe usage meters and tiered pricing with real-time tracking, customer portal integration, and migration strategy.
acceptance: Products and prices for Starter, Pro, Enterprise tiers
Webhooks for invoice and usage events registered
impact: 70%+ gross margin and accurate usage-based billing with lower support overhead.

title: Cost Monitoring & Budget Controls
problem: No real-time cost monitoring exists, creating risk of budget overruns.
solution: Build API cost tracking, budget allocations, alerts, circuit breakers, and admin dashboards.
acceptance: Supabase tables api_usage_logs and budget_allocations in place
Budget alerts and circuit breaker logic active
impact: Cost visibility with enforced budget protection across tiers.

title: Pricing Strategy Implementation
problem: Base and Professional tiers remain loss-making at low volumes.
solution: Adopt usage-based tiers (Starter, Pro, Enterprise, Financial Services) with gating and migration plan.
impact: Sustainable unit economics across all tiers with transparent billing.
requirements: Edge Function enforcement and audit logs
